recieved_hits.description: Number of shots user's vehicle received with damage and not

received_hits_without_dmg.description: Number of hits received without any damage

recieved_hits_module_only.description: Number of hits received with damage only to vehicle modules

received_hits_hp.description: Number of hits with damage to hp received

recieved_hits_teammates.description: Number of hits received from teammates

shots_auto_aim.description: Number of shots with auto aiming

hits.description: Number of shots that reached enemy vehicle

hits_without_dmg.description: Number of hits without damage to enemy's hp or modules

hits_module_only.description: Number of hits with damage only to enemy's modules, without damage to enemy's hp

hits_hp.description: Number of hits with damage to enemies' hp

hits_teammates.description: Number of shots that reached teammates vehicle

damaged_vehicle.description: Number of vehicle damaged to hp or modules

damage_assisted_radio.description: Damage dealt by smb (not this user), with this user radio

damage_assisted_track.description: Damage dealt by smb (not this user), after this user track crit

win_points.description: Number of win points contributed by player in supremacy mode.

captured_base.description: Number of succesfully captured base where user take part in

capture_points.description: Capture points by user vehicle in succesful base capture

capture_points_dropped.description: Dropped enemys base capture points by user

heal_income.description: Count hp that came from something to user's vehicle

heal_outcome.description: Count hp that user give to somebody in any way

heal_self.description: Count hp that user regenerate by himself

battle_efficiency.description: Battle user efficiency. Used for raiting calculation but its NOT raiting
